A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie suffers greatly on Rey have zero to no character development\, mixed together with a plot that trips on itself. The movie had chances to make interesting and changing motifs but decides to go the safest route failing to establish itself or giving it a identity to separate itself. The end of the movie answers several questions but builds nothing on the Star Wars Universe.\n\nIt feels like a safe\, soulless\, unimaginative cash grab. I feel really disappointed in the turn the movie took.
